title: Simplify site navigation to Home, About Us, and Get in Touch; update footer to Instagram-only

requirements.text: Remove the Our Work (Portfolio), Pricing, and Package Details/Packages sections from the site so that only the Home, About Us, and Get in Touch sections are visible.

quotes: Remove the Pricing And Package Details & Our work Pages Only have to Visible Home Page & About us & Get in Touch Pages

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` no longer imports or renders `PortfolioSection`, `PricingSection`, or `PackagesSection`.
The page no longer shows any Portfolio/Our Work gallery UI, Pricing tiers UI, or Packages/Package Details accordion UI.
The Contact/Get in Touch section remains visible and functional.

requirements.text: Update the top navigation to remove links to Our Work, Pricing, and Packages, leaving only Home and About Us, plus the existing Get in Touch call-to-action.

quotes: Remove the Pricing And Package Details & Our work Pages Only have to Visible Home Page & About us & Get in Touch Pages

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx` no longer renders nav items for `portfolio`, `pricing`, or `packages` in desktop or mobile menus.
NavBar has working navigation for Home (`#home`) and About Us (`#about`), and the Get in Touch button scrolls to `#contact` on both desktop and mobile.

requirements.text: Update the Home hero section buttons so there is no call-to-action that scrolls to the removed Our Work/Portfolio section.

quotes: Remove the Pricing And Package Details & Our work Pages

acceptanceCriteria: All buttons shown in the Home hero scroll to sections that still exist (e.g., About Us and/or Get in Touch) and do not produce errors in the console when clicked.

requirements.text: Update the footer to remove the Quick Links and Contact sections entirely, and keep only a Follow Us area that contains a single Instagram link to https://www.instagram.com/thestoriesbehindvows?igsh=bWdrN3o1M21meDBn.

quotes: Remove Quick links and Contact Details Just  Add  instagram link at Follow Us Hear is the link https://www.instagram.com/thestoriesbehindvows?igsh=bWdrN3o1M21meDBn

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx` no longer renders the Quick Links list and no longer renders any Contact details (email/phone/address).

The Follow Us section includes exactly one social link: Instagram, pointing to `https://www.instagram.com/thestoriesbehindvows?igsh=bWdrN3o1M21meDBn`, opening in a new tab (`target="_blank"`) with `rel="noopener noreferrer"`.
No Facebook or X links/icons are shown in the footer.
Footer layout remains visually consistent (no empty columns or obvious spacing gaps).

constraints: Frontend files under `frontend/src/components/ui` and the immutable hook/bootstrap paths must not be edited.
Do not add backend persistence or new backend features; this change is frontend-only.
nonGoals: Redesigning the overall minimal visual theme beyond what is necessary to remove the specified sections and footer content.
Adding new social platforms or additional footer content beyond the requested Instagram link.
